txt.en: 'We have delayed too long, here they come!'
'More are upon us!'
'Into Ost Celebrant, NOW! There are too many!'
'Fortune is with us, we have made it!'
'What you see now is all that I remember of that long-past day...'
'Everyone, to me!'
'But yet, this all feels so familiar....'
'Now, quickly, we must reach my men in Ost Celebrant!'
'I cannot believe this devastation... so much terror has consumed the field in so small a time....'
'Curse them! They should not have been able to cross the Limlight....'
'The Easterlings have always sought to take from us what is rightfully ours, but these new foes... they fight relentlessly.'
'My memories have failed me... Ost Celebrant lies in ruin and I can no longer see myself as I once was....'
'We have already lost Calenardhon to the Easterlings, the Orcs assault from the west, and we are fewer each day....'
'Men, they are upon us! Ready your arms!'
'Some action must be taken... but what?'
'Stay alert, men!'
'Our men to the south have failed, we must retreat to Ost Celebrant!'
'Wait... on your guard!'
'Their numbers are many, we must hurry!'
'Leave the treasure, and begone from this place!'
'You coward! How could you?!'
'You have made a wise choice, Doron of Gondor. Your men are fortunate to have a leader such as you - a leader who so clearly embodies the might of Gondor.... Come men, we go!'
'You fool! We swore an oath to defend Gondor from these monsters, and you allow them to run rampant! You disgust me!'
'No, it is you who is the fool, Cabed. Even if Gondor falls, these treasures will bring us fortune in the years to come!'
'Now you understand, let us leave this vile memory behind....'
'The Easterlings have breached the field to the south, and they have moved to cut us off from Cirion and the others.'
'They are no doubt amassing outside the fortress as we speak.'
'Look upon the treasures of Rh√ªn... all of this and your lives will be yours to keep....'
'We cannot pretend that Gondor has the advantage any longer. This foe is mighty, and without the aid of Cirion and our fellows... we will fall.'
'Take this, and abandon your worthless charge. Let us flood across the Limlight, and hinder us no longer. When Gondor lies in ruin, you and your men shall remain....'
'We can tarry no longer. You three, come with me. The rest of you, secure the fortress. Glory to Gondor!'
'And if we refuse?'
'Invaders... I am Doron of Gondor! You move to strike against a fortress of my people. Abandon your assault and leave our lands, or prepare to face our might!'
'We will slaughter every last one among you. Your leader and your fellow kin on the field will not escape their fates, no matter your choice.'
'But you fool yourself.... We are more than enough to crush your forces!'
'Make your choice NOW, Gondorian, or we shall make it for you!'
'A bold command, Doron of Gondor...'
'Has your mind been lost? We should never consider an offer from these brutes! Let us fall in battle alongside our kin and lord Cirion!'
'Why then do you not fall upon us where we stand?'
'Be silent, deserter! Who are you to speak of glory?'
'Although many among us thirst to see you and your kinsmen rent asunder, we will offer you a chance to be spared our wrath.'
'Quiet, both of you! I have made my choice.'
'What madness is this? What makes you think we would ever listen to the likes of you?'
'Speak, my men grow restless!'

'We shall stand down. I harbour no desire for treasure, but I cannot allow you to cut down my men. This conflict grows desperate for us, and I only hope that Gondor can be preserved through my actions.'
